metadata.name: Bitsadmin to Uncommon IP Server Address
metadata.comment: Detects Bitsadmin connections to IP addresses instead of FQDN names

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM http_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (startswith(lower(http_request.user_agent), lower('microsoft bits/')) AND (endswith(lower(dst_endpoint.hostname), lower('1')) OR endswith(lower(dst_endpoint.hostname), lower('2')) OR endswith(lower(dst_endpoint.hostname), lower('3')) OR endswith(lower(dst_endpoint.hostname), lower('4')) OR endswith(lower(dst_endpoint.hostname), lower('5')) OR endswith(lower(dst_endpoint.hostname), lower('6')) OR endswith(lower(dst_endpoint.hostname), lower('7')) OR endswith(lower(dst_endpoint.hostname), lower('8')) OR endswith(lower(dst_endpoint.hostname), lower('9'))))

output.summary: Detects Bitsadmin connections to IP addresses instead of FQDN names
